Text:
This is guaranteed to be the best quality picture out there. check the comparison and you'll understand why:
http://screenshotcomparison.com/comparison/33926

Thanks ChattChitto, I downloaded it and it is higher res than a standard DVD. So I watched it on from my PC's hard drive attaching it to my hugh HD flat screen TV! I made a copy on DVD and the software downgraded it to DVD (720x480) format. And the DVD is like any DVD you get from the store- Awesome! Thanks a million!
